title.value: Method of clonal micropropagation of breeding lines of cabbage (Brassica capitata (L.) Lizg.)
Методика клонального микроразмножения селекционных линий капусты белокачанной (Brassica oleracea var. Capitata L.)

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Pavlova, I.V., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: Reproduction in sterile conditions in vitro to produce genetically identical the material of individual plants is an important event for the reproduction of valuable varieties and lines of such important agricultural crop as white cabbage (Brassica oleracea convar. capitata var. alba L.). In course of the study there were used white cabbage varieties Nadzeya (control) and 2 samples with cytoplasmic male sterility. The realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus experiments revealed that cabbage genotypes differing in earliness, have similar characteristics of growth, shooting, rooting on relevant hormonal background. There was confirmed the practical effectiveness of the guidelines for each stage of the process of in vitro cultivation of various organs and tissues of cabbage. The necessity of meeting deadlines for ground planting of in vitro cultivated cabbage plants depending on the ripeness of the genotype.
